title: How to Delete an AOL Account: A Quick & Easy Tutorial

steps.title: Open the AOL cancellation page.
steps.content: Open the AOL cancellation page. Go to https://aol.mydashboard.oath.com/delete-my-account in your computer's web browser.

steps.title: Log into your account if necessary.
steps.content: Log into your account if necessary. If prompted to enter your login information, type in your email address, click Next , enter your AOL password, and click Sign in .

steps.title: Click Continue delete my account.
steps.content: Click Continue delete my account . This red button is near the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Enter your email address.
steps.content: Enter your email address. Click the text box in the middle of the page, then type in your full AOL account's email address.

steps.title: Click Yes, terminate this account.
steps.content: Click Yes, terminate this account . It's a blue button at the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Click Got it when prompted.
steps.content: Click Got it when prompted. Doing so signifies that your AOL account has been removed from the AOL database and is in the process of being deleted. It may take a couple of weeks for your AOL account to disappear from search engine results.
